content: Let this be known now: Salvador Tío is The Bernie Sanders of ,#,PuertoRico,pic.twitter.com/vZgFQVcDJ6
Dont insult that man.
"That man" is my friend. "That man" is a committed activist who has advocated for independence and progressive issues for decades. "That man" is a movement leader.

It trivializes so much of who “that man” is to describe him as the Bernie Sanders of Puerto Rico; a fact which I think you know and should have acknowledged hours ago instead of engaging in this protracted tap dance
Maybe you should ask “that man” what he thinks. Because, I did.
Maybe you should learn to spell "that man"'s name before calling him a friend or speaking for him?
Uh, I did. It’s literally how he spells it. Do you know him? Because he’s a friend. The woman who attacks and seems to know his story actually doesn’t know him. So I wonder where this comes from?!.
From the disgruntled disinformation contingent eager to tar any reference to Sanders as a negative.

For pointing out she calls a man her friend & doesnt know how to spell his name?
Also Sanders doesnt hold a candle to Fernandez's record.
Please tell me his name is actually Tío
His last name
You should probably delete this post - it's the height of white arrogance to proclaim this highly accomplished , extremely well educated lawyer and activist is a brown version of Bernie.

Agreed !
As is a POC can't just be a hero on their own, they have to do it under the umbrella of a White Man.
No thanks.
Delete this post.

or even worse it reads like Bernie is co opting Salvador Tío success & hard work as his own, either way it's a shit take that needs deleted or at the very least give this man the credit he deserves with out Sanders name attached AT ALL he has NOTHING to do w/ his achievements.
For fuck sake, calling a POC, who is roughly the same age as Bernie, and not a disciple of Bernie, the "Bernie Sanders of PR" is egrecious, and offensive in a number of different ways.
Uh, I asked Salvador myself. But somehow you think you can speak on his behalf, erasing his voice? Mmmkay.

Yeah, I am shocked you would ask him that corny shit, and thought it was funny. "His voice", allowing you to post a silly ass joke, has nothing to do with his voice, maybe it has something to do with him being a gentleman, either way you should see the issue with the tweet.
He’s supportive of Bernie, whether you like it or not
So what, that's not the point, but it's no surprise you don't understand cultural and racial nuisances. I'm not a person who hates Bernie so you have the wrong one with that.

But don't take my word for it, you are not going to learn until 2020 and he gets trashed again in the Democratic primary and large part because he and his supporters are tone deaf to cultural and race issues, and he can't win the black vote, and don't cite no silly ass approval
rating survey.

Ye Gods, woman, I thought you were annoying in your unadulterated Bernie-shilling, but this is Palin-level ignorance, what's the matter, can't you tell us Brown people apart??
